fileName.description: Assay file name. Expected filename pattern is a_*.txt
fileName.title: Filename

measurementType.description: A term to qualify what is being measured (e.g. metabolite identification).

technologyType.description: Term to identify the technology used to perform the measurement, e.g. NMR spectrometry assay, mass spectrometry assay

technologyPlatform.description: Platform information such as assay technique name, polarity, column model, manufacturer, platform name.
technologyPlatform.title: Technologyplatform

filePath.description: Relative file path of ISA table file (s_*.txt, a_*.txt, m_*.tsv).
filePath.title: Filepath

sha256Hash.description: SHA256 hash value of ISA table file.
sha256Hash.title: Sha256Hash

table.description: All or partial content of ISA table file.

sampleNames.description: Unique values in `Sample Name` column in the assay file.
sampleNames.title: Samplenames

assayNames.description: Unique values in `Assay Name` column in the assay file.
assayNames.title: Assaynames

referencedAssignmentFiles.description: Relative paths of Metabolite Assignment File in the assay file.
referencedAssignmentFiles.title: Referencedassignmentfiles

referencedRawFiles.description: Relative paths of referenced raw files in the assay file.
referencedRawFiles.title: Referencedrawfiles

referencedDerivedFiles.description: Relative paths of referenced derived files in the assay file.
referencedDerivedFiles.title: Referencedderivedfiles

referencedRawFileExtensions.description: Unique file extensions of referenced raw files in the assay file.
referencedRawFileExtensions.title: Referencedrawfileextensions

referencedDerivedFileExtensions.description: Unique file extensions of referenced derived files in the assay file.
referencedDerivedFileExtensions.title: Referencedderivedfileextensions

name.description: Technique name used to identify metabolites.
name.title: Name

mainTechnique.description: Main category of metabolite identification technique.
mainTechnique.title: Maintechnique

filePath.description: Relative file path of ISA table file (s_*.txt, a_*.txt, m_*.tsv).
filePath.title: Filepath

sha256Hash.description: SHA256 hash value of ISA table file.
sha256Hash.title: Sha256Hash

table.description: All or partial content of ISA table file.

identifiedMetaboliteNames.description: Names of metabolites defined in the ISA table.
identifiedMetaboliteNames.title: Identifiedmetabolitenames

metaboliteAssignments.description: Metabolite names and assigned CHEBI id values in the ISA table.
metaboliteAssignments.title: Metaboliteassignments

assayTechnique.description: Assay technique of assays that reference the current m_*.tsv file.

numberOfRows.description: Number of rows in ISA table.
numberOfRows.title: Numberofrows

numberOfAssignedRows.description: Number of rows assigned a CHEBI id.
numberOfAssignedRows.title: Numberofassignedrows

numberOfUnassignedRows.description: Number of rows not assigned a CHEBI id.
numberOfUnassignedRows.title: Numberofunassignedrows

name.description: The name of one factor used in the Study files. A factor corresponds to an independent variable manipulated by the experimentalist with the intention to affect biological systems in a way that can be measured by an assay.
name.title: Name

type.description: A term allowing the classification of the factor into categories. The term is a controlled vocabulary or an ontology

comments.description: List of comments linked to the related section
comments.title: Comments

title.description: A concise name given to the investigation.
title.title: Title

description.description: A textual description of the investigation.
description.title: Description

submissionDate.description: The date on which the investigation was reported to the MetaboLights repository. String formatted as ISO8601 date YYYY-MM-DD
submissionDate.title: Submissiondate

publicReleaseDate.description: The date on which the investigation was released publicly. String formatted as ISO8601 date YYYY-MM-DD
publicReleaseDate.title: Publicreleasedate

ontologySourceReferences.description: Ontology sources used in the i_Investigation.txt file

investigationPublications.description: All publications prepared to report results of the investigation.

studies.description: Studies carried out in the investigation.
studies.title: Studies

comments.description: List of comments linked to the related section
comments.title: Comments

comments.description: List of comments linked to the related section
comments.title: Comments

columns.description: Unique column names of ISA table. If there are dublicate column headers, column names are created with the following pattern: header name + '.X' where X is sequencial number for each duplicate header name.
columns.title: Columns

headers.description: Metadata of ISA table columns. e.i., header name, column name, column index
headers.title: Headers

data.description: Data columns and their row values.
data.title: Data

rowIndices.description: Current rows' positions in ISA table. e.g., [2, 3, 5]: First three rows of 'data' are 2nd, 3th and 5th rows in ISA Table.
rowIndices.title: Rowindices

columnIndices.description: Current columns' positions in ISA table.
columnIndices.title: Columnindices

filteredTotalRowCount.description: Total row count after filter operations.
filteredTotalRowCount.title: Filteredtotalrowcount

rowCount.description: Row count listed in this table after filter operations.
rowCount.title: Rowcount

totalRowCount.description: Total row count in ISA table file.
totalRowCount.title: Totalrowcount

selectedColumnCount.description: Number of selected columns in this table file.
selectedColumnCount.title: Selectedcolumncount

totalColumnCount.description: Number of all columns in ISA table file.
totalColumnCount.title: Totalcolumncount

filterOptions.description: Applied filters on ISA table file.
filterOptions.title: Filteroptions

sortOptions.description: Applied sort operations on ISA table file.
sortOptions.title: Sortoptions

columnIndex.description: Index of column in ISA Table. First column index is 0.
columnIndex.title: Columnindex

columnName.description: Unique name of column. It is same if column header is unique in ISA table.
columnName.title: Columnname

additionalColumns.description: Linked column names. If column is ontology or a column with unit ontology column, it lists the following column headers.
additionalColumns.title: Additionalcolumns

columnCategory.description: Column category. e.g., Parameter Value, Factor Value, protocol
columnCategory.title: Columncategory

columnStructure.description: Structure of column in ISA table.

columnPrefix.description: Column prefix if header has a value between [].
columnPrefix.title: Columnprefix

columnSearchPattern.description: Search regex expression to fetch value if if header has a value between [].
columnSearchPattern.title: Columnsearchpattern

termAccessionNumber.description: The accession number from the Term Source associated with the term.
termAccessionNumber.title: Termaccessionnumber

termSourceRef.description: Source reference name of ontology term. e.g., EFO, OBO, NCIT. Ontology source reference names should be defined in ontology source references section in i_Investigation.txt file
termSourceRef.title: Termsourceref

termSourceRef.description: Source reference name of ontology term. e.g., EFO, OBO, NCIT.
termSourceRef.title: Termsourceref

sourceName.description: The name of the source of a term; i.e. the source controlled vocabulary or ontology. These names will be used in all corresponding Term Source REF fields that occur elsewhere.
sourceName.title: Sourcename

sourceFile.description: A file name or a URI of an official resource.
sourceFile.title: Sourcefile

sourceVersion.description: The version number of the Term Source to support terms tracking.
sourceVersion.title: Sourceversion

sourceDescription.description: Description of source. Use for disambiguating resources when homologous prefixes have been used.
sourceDescription.title: Sourcedescription

comments.description: List of comments linked to the related section
comments.title: Comments

references.description: List of ontology sources used in ISA metadata files.
references.title: References

type.description: Message type. Valid values: INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL.

section.description: Section name if it is i_Investigation.txt file
section.title: Section

line.description: File line number. It is valid only for i_Investigation.txt file.
line.title: Line

lastName.description: Last name of a person associated with the investigation or study.
lastName.title: Lastname

firstName.description: First name of person associated with the investigation or study.
firstName.title: Firstname

midInitials.description: Middle name initials (if exists) of person associated with the investigation or study
midInitials.title: Midinitials

email.description: Email address of person associated with the investigation or study
email.title: Email

phone.description: Phone number of person associated with the investigation or study
phone.title: Phone

fax.description: Fax number of person associated with the investigation or study
fax.title: Fax

address.description: Address of person associated with the investigation or study
address.title: Address

affiliation.description: Affiliation of person associated with the investigation or study
affiliation.title: Affiliation

roles.description: Roles of person associated with the investigation or study. Multiple role can be defined for each person. Role is defined as an ontology term. e.g., NCIT:Investigator, NCIT:Author
roles.title: Roles

uri.description: Pointer to external protocol resources that can be accessed by their Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
uri.title: Uri

version.description: An identifier for the version to ensure protocol tracking..
version.title: Version

components.description: Protocol’s components; e.g. instrument names, software names, and reagents names.
components.title: Components

pubMedId.description: The PubMed IDs of the publication.
pubMedId.title: Pubmedid

doi.description: A Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for the publication.
doi.title: Doi

authorList.description: The list of authors associated with the publication. Comma (,) is recommended to define multiple authors.
authorList.title: Authorlist

title.description: The title of publication associated with the investigation.
title.title: Title

status.description: A term describing the status of that publication (i.e. EFO:submitted, EFO:in preparation, EFO:published).

filePath.description: Relative file path of ISA table file (s_*.txt, a_*.txt, m_*.tsv).
filePath.title: Filepath

sha256Hash.description: SHA256 hash value of ISA table file.
sha256Hash.title: Sha256Hash

table.description: All or partial content of ISA table file.

sampleNames.description: Unique values in `Sample Name` column in the sample file.
sampleNames.title: Samplenames

organisms.description: Unique organism values in the sample file.
organisms.title: Organisms

organismParts.description: Unique organism part values in the sample file.
organismParts.title: Organismparts

organismAndOrganismPartPairs.description: Unique organism, organism part, variant and sample type values in the sample file.
organismAndOrganismPartPairs.title: Organismandorganismpartpairs

variants.description: Unique variant values in the sample file.
variants.title: Variants

sampleTypes.description: Unique sample type values in the sample file.
sampleTypes.title: Sampletypes

comments.description: List of comments linked to the related section
comments.title: Comments

identifier.description: A unique identifier, either a temporary identifier generated by MetaboLights repository.
identifier.title: Identifier

title.description: A concise phrase used to encapsulate the purpose and goal of the study.
title.title: Title

description.description: A textual description of the study, with components such as objective or goals.
description.title: Description

submissionDate.description: The date on which the study is submitted to an archive. String formatted as ISO8601 date YYYY-MM-DD
submissionDate.title: Submissiondate

publicReleaseDate.description: The date on which the study SHOULD be released publicly. String formatted as ISO8601 date YYYY-MM-DD
publicReleaseDate.title: Publicreleasedate

fileName.description: Name of the Sample Table file corresponding the definition of that Study.
fileName.title: Filename

studyDesignDescriptors.description: Content of study design descriptors section.

studyAssays.description: Study assay section of i_Investigation.txt file. This section contains study assays and comments.

comments.description: List of comments linked to the related section
comments.title: Comments

assays.description: List of assays defined in study assay section.
assays.title: Assays

comments.description: List of comments linked to the related section
comments.title: Comments

people.description: Contacts defined in study contacts section
people.title: People

numericStudyId.description: Numarical part of study accession number. e.g., 123 for MTBLS123
numericStudyId.title: Numericstudyid

releaseDate.description: Study public release date (actual or anticipated.)
releaseDate.title: Releasedate

statusDate.description: Last status update date of study.
statusDate.title: Statusdate

curationRequest.description: Curation request. e.g., no curation request, manual curation request.

comments.description: List of comments linked to the related section
comments.title: Comments

designTypes.description: Design descriptors defined in study design descriptors section.
designTypes.title: Designtypes

comments.description: List of comments linked to the related section
comments.title: Comments

factors.description: Factors defined in study factors section.
factors.title: Factors

baseName.description: File basename. e.g., raw_data.d for FILES/RAW_FILES/raw_data.d
baseName.title: Basename

parentDirectory.description: Relative parent directory. e.g., FILES/RAW_FILES for FILES/RAW_FILES/raw_data.d
parentDirectory.title: Parentdirectory

extension.description: File extension. e.g., .d for raw_data.d for FILES/RAW_FILES/raw_data.d
extension.title: Extension

isDirectory.description: True if the file is a folder.
isDirectory.title: Isdirectory

isLink.description: True if the file is a symbolic link.
isLink.title: Islink

modifiedAt.description: Modified time of the file. The value is a timestamp in UTC.
modifiedAt.title: Modifiedat

createdAt.description: Creation time of the file. The value is a timestamp in UTC.
createdAt.title: Createdat

mode.description: File permission mode in octal. e.g., 775
mode.title: Mode

dataFolderSizeCalculated.description: True if data folder size is calculated.
dataFolderSizeCalculated.title: Datafoldersizecalculated

metadataFolderSizeCalculated.description: True if metadata folder size is calculated.
metadataFolderSizeCalculated.title: Metadatafoldersizecalculated

folderSizeInBytes.description: Study folder size in bytes. Folder size may be size of metadata files, data files or both depends on data_folder_size_calculated or metadata_folder_size_calculated.
folderSizeInBytes.title: Foldersizeinbytes

folderSizeInStr.description: Human readable study folder size in MB or GB
folderSizeInStr.title: Foldersizeinstr

folders.description: Folders and summary information about each one within a study folder.
folders.title: Folders

files.description: Files and summary information about each one within a study folder.
files.title: Files

comments.description: List of comments linked to the related section
comments.title: Comments

protocols.description: Protocols defined in study protocol section.
protocols.title: Protocols

comments.description: List of comments linked to the related section
comments.title: Comments

publications.description: Publications defined in study publications section.
publications.title: Publications

searchColumns.description: Search column names. Search in any column if it is None or empty
searchColumns.title: Searchcolumns

searchIgnoreColumns.description: Ignore selected columns if search column is None or empty
searchIgnoreColumns.title: Searchignorecolumns

dataType.description: Apply filter with the given data type

caseSensitive.description: String operations will be applied in case sensitive mode
caseSensitive.title: Casesensitive

defaultDatetimePattern.description: Convert string value to datetime using this pattern
defaultDatetimePattern.title: Defaultdatetimepattern

columnName.description: Column name that sort operation will be applied.Column name may be different if there are multiple columns with same name.If there are multiple column headers, Second column and others are named as <column header>.1 <column header>.2 and so on.
columnName.title: Columnname

columnSortType.description: Sort value with the given type

caseSensitive.description: Sort string values in case sensitive order
caseSensitive.title: Casesensitive

defaultDatetimePattern.description: Convert string value to datetime using this pattern
defaultDatetimePattern.title: Defaultdatetimepattern

valueOrder.description: Position of valid and empty values if sort type is int, float or datetime

minKeyLength.description: If sort type is not string, values will be converted to string and short strings will be filled with 0.
minKeyLength.title: Minkeylength

investigationFilePath.description: Relative path of investigation file. e.g., i_Investigation.txt
investigationFilePath.title: Investigationfilepath

samples.description: Dictionary of sample files and their content. Only one sample file can be referenced in investigation file.
samples.title: Samples

assays.description: Study assay files and their contents. Multiple assay files can be defined in investigation file.
assays.title: Assays

parserMessages.description: An dictionary to store parser message list for each ISA metadata file contains any type of parser message.
parserMessages.title: Parsermessages

referencedAssignmentFiles.description: Relative paths of all assignment files referenced in assay files.
referencedAssignmentFiles.title: Referencedassignmentfiles

referencedRawFiles.description: Relative paths of all raw files referenced in assay files.
referencedRawFiles.title: Referencedrawfiles

referencedDerivedFiles.description: Relative paths of all derived files referenced in assay files.
referencedDerivedFiles.title: Referencedderivedfiles

foldersInHierarchy.description: Relative folder paths that contain files referenced in assay files.
foldersInHierarchy.title: Foldersinhierarchy

metaboliteAssignments.description: Metabolite assignment files and their contents.
metaboliteAssignments.title: Metaboliteassignments

studyDbMetadata.description: Basic metatada information (status, database id, etc.) stored in database.

studyFolderMetadata.description: Descriptors of files and folders within study folder.

hasDbMetadata.description: True if database metadata is loaded.
hasDbMetadata.title: Hasdbmetadata

hasSampleTableData.description: True if sample file is loaded.
hasSampleTableData.title: Hassampletabledata

hasAssayTableData.description: True if assay files are loaded.
hasAssayTableData.title: Hasassaytabledata

hasAssignmentTableData.description: True if assignment files are loaded
hasAssignmentTableData.title: Hasassignmenttabledata

hasFolderMetadata.description: True if folder metadata is complete.
hasFolderMetadata.title: Hasfoldermetadata

hasInvestigationData.description: True if investtigation file is loaded.
hasInvestigationData.title: Hasinvestigationdata
